Title: Police security at some colleges to prevent protests
Content: Heavy police security was deployed at some colleges in Malleswaram and Rajajinagar on Thursday to prevent students from taking to the streets again demanding action against Amnesty International.While
Author: Special Correspondent
Description: Heavy police security was deployed at some colleges in Malleswaram and Rajajinagar on Thursday to prevent students from taking to the streets again demanding action against Amnesty International.While
